article.title: Committees providing EJR can be computed efficiently

multiple_choice_question.text: What does EJR stand for in the context of approval-based multi-winner elections?
Which of the following statements about the PJR-Exact family of voting rules is TRUE?
choices: They always remove a whole number of votes at each iteration.
They prioritize candidates with the lowest dissatisfaction level.
They guarantee that all candidates in a normal state will be elected.
They utilize the exact quota as the maximum number of votes removed per iteration.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is a key characteristic of a candidate in a "starving state" according to the paper\'s terminology?
choices: The candidate is no longer considered for election.
The candidate has a high chance of being elected in the next iteration.
The candidate is approved by voters who have not had enough of their preferred candidates elected.
The candidate has a dissatisfaction level of 0.

multiple_choice_question.text: What party-list proportional representation system does the EJR-LR-Even rule primarily reduce to?
